import { Croppie } from 'croppie' import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import { SERVER_URL } from '../../../config/settings' import { csrftoken, openCloseEmojiList } from '../../../config/utils' import { ProfileImageContext } from '../../../context/editprofile/EditProfileContext' export default function CroppieModal(props) { const [profileImage, setProfileImage] = useContext(ProfileImageContext) const file = React.createRef() const croppie = React.createRef() const img = React.createRef() return ( window.history.back()} /> Editar perfil
) }
